title: Fix an error in the issue retrieval for private github issues
body:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/bugbug-data-github", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scripts/github_issue_retriever.py", line 154, in main
    retriever.retrieve_issues()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scripts/github_issue_retriever.py", line 84, in retrieve_issues
    self.replace_with_private(data)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scripts/github_issue_retriever.py", line 51, in replace_with_private
    private_issue = self.github.fetch_issue_by_number(
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/bugbug/github.py", line 152, in fetch_issue_by_number
    data = self.fetch_issues(url=url, retrieve_events=retrieve_events)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/bugbug/github.py", line 74, in fetch_issues
    response.raise_for_status()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/requests/models.py", line 953, in raise_for_status
    raise HTTPError(http_error_msg, response=self)
```
